page.title: 16 V.G.MIDDLE SCHOOL (2).
page.content: Valley Gardens pupils wear a compulsory uniform consisting of white/blue shirts for girls and also grey for boys.Blue or grey jumpers for both.Dark skirts and trousers.Sensible shoes and school tie.The school day begins at 9.00am followed by half an hour of tutorial time and assemblies twice a week.The first years timetable consists of Maths English,Science,Music,History,Geography Craft,P.E,Games,R.E and Linguistics.The 2nd years timetable is the same apart from they get French.The 3rd and 4th years get Biology.1 hour homework is given every night.The first lesson ends at 10.35am followed by a 15 min break. Lessons begin at 10.50am and end at 12.00pm.A 1hr 15 mins lunch break follows and lessons resume at 1.20pm finishing at 2.25pm a break follows.The last lesson starts at 2.40 and ends at 3.45.
